component.name: listProcessRules
component.description: Get the List of Process Rules.

component.name: getSpecificProcessRule
component.description: get the metadata for a specific sObject Process rule

component.name: getSpecificProcessRuleList
component.description: Gets all active workflow rules for an sObject.

component.name: returnHeadersForProcessRules
component.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the listProcessRules operation.

component.name: returnHeadersForSpecificProcessRule
component.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the getSpecificProcessRule operation.

component.name: returnHeadersForSpecificProcessRuleList
component.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the getSpecificProcessRuleList operation.

component.name: triggerProcessRules
component.description: Triggers all active workflow rules. All rules associated with the specified ID are evaluated, regardless of the evaluation criteria. All IDs must be for records on the same object.

component.name: triggerRuleForSpecificProcessRule
component.description: Triggers an active workflow rule regardless of the evaluation criteria.
